buildCommand: git config --global --add safe.directory '*' && git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git --depth 1 -b stable && export PATH="$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH" && flutter pub get && flutter build web --release --dart-define=SUPABASE_URL=$SUPABASE_URL --dart-define=SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=$SUPABASE_ANON_KEY --dart-define=PAYSTACK_PUBLIC_KEY=$PAYSTACK_PUBLIC_KEY
